name: reverb-feedboost
description: Get notified when your Reverb.com feed updates within an hour!

scripts.checkup: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && babel src -d build
scripts.deploy: npm run checkup && npm run build && npm prune --production && sls deploy -s dev -v && sls -s dev files ; npm install
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run checkup && npm run build && npm prune --production && sls deploy -s production -v && sls -s production files ; npm install
